title: Hanes Men's Originals Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Lightweight Tri-Blend Jersey Tee for Men, Available in Tall
description: BASICS THAT ARE FAR FROM BASIC – A stylish collection of cool, modern essentials designed for comfort, made for every body. Be yourself in Hanes Originals.
SUPER SOFT & COMFY FEEL - Our best polyester, cotton, and rayon come together to make this soft and comfy tee shirt for men.
COLD WATER WASH - Hanes recommends machine washing this long-sleeve t-shirt in cold water to reduce energy consumption.
HANES QUALITY - Expertly constructed with double-needle stitching at the armholes and shoulder-to-shoulder taping for a t-shirt that will last a long time.
SO MANY OPTIONS - Get this men's t-shirt in a variety of colors and sizes!

Soft and lightweight, this men's long-sleeve tee is made with a portion of recycled polyester, so you can feel good about looking good. Designed to combine comfort and style, we're proud to call this men's long-sleeve t-shirt one of our Hanes® Originals. A set-in ribbed crew neckline adds to the classic style of this must-have men's tee. Layer it or wear it alone for an easy, casual-cool look.
